summary: The story of British Prime Minister Sir Winston Churchill, focusing on his place in British life just prior to World War II.
cast: Richard Burton|Virginia McKenna|Angharad Rees|Lesley Dunlop|Clive Francis|Thorley Walters|Robin Bailey|Robert Beatty|Michael Elwyn|Ian Bannen|Robert Hardy|John Phillips|Geoffrey Bayldon|Steve Plytas|Ian Ogilvy|Denis Lill|Patrick Stewart|Edward Evans|Laurence Hardy|John Rutland|Richard Leech|Terence Longdon|Brook Williams|Kenneth Scott|Fiona Walker|John Kane|Verna Harvey|Patsy Byrne|Christopher Leonard|Terence Conoley|Jacki Webb|Simon Stevens|Victor Harrington|Walter Henry
title: The Gathering Storm
